alert.note: Alert for Fluvanna; Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 5:22PM EDT until June 26 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Louisa County in central Virginia... Fluvanna County in central Virginia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 521 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Monticello, or 9 miles west of Palmyra, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lake Monticello around 535 PM EDT. Palmyra and Troy around 550 PM EDT. Fork Union around 555 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Dixie, Nahor, Shores, Zion Crossroads, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff, Antioch, Union Mills, Wildwood and Bybee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
